column4: Could you re-install Evolution?  That application has many other applications dependent on it.
ok, so you mean do a sudo apt-get --reinstall install evolution?
Is it not installed now?  Sounded like It was not.  Either way, yes, uninstall and re-install.
well, it was processed up to the point of configuration, which it choked on. So it's *half-installed* you mite say 8 )
